11. Reaffirms its determination to intensify the fight against terrorism.

12. Invites the Secretary-General to present a report on proposals made during the ministerial meeting.

13. Encourages Member States to cooperate in resolving outstanding issues related to the adoption of conventions on international terrorism.

14. Decides to review actions taken towards the realization of this declaration at further meetings.
